transportAdvice: Seoul has an extensive and efficient metro and bus network that covers virtually all major tourist areas, making it easy to get around without a car. Taxis are widely available, metered, and generally affordable, while many central neighborhoods are highly walkable.

weather.description: Cold and dry winter month with occasional snow and clear skies.
Still cold but slightly milder than January, with occasional light snow.
Early spring brings warming temperatures and occasional dusty winds from the north.
Pleasant spring weather with cherry blossoms in full bloom and mild temperatures.
Warm and comfortable with longer days, one of the best months to visit.
Early monsoon season begins with increasing humidity and frequent rain.
Peak monsoon month with heavy rainfall, high humidity, and hot temperatures.
Hot and humid with lingering monsoon rains tapering toward the end of the month.
Monsoon ends and autumn begins with comfortable temperatures and clearer skies.
Crisp and sunny autumn weather with vivid fall foliage across the city's parks.
Cooling temperatures and dry conditions mark the transition toward winter.
Cold and dry with occasional snow, festive atmosphere in the city center.
